title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        North Cascades offers a variety of programs in the different areas of the park. You can check out Ranger Programs for interpretive programs, ranger-led walks and talks, to find program and events that occur during your visit, or check locally at visitor centers.         Annual Events  Skagit Eagle Festival (December and January) National Park Week (last full week of April) Neotropical bird migration (mid-to-late spring)           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      North Cascades National Park Diablo Overlook Ranger Talk      Location: Diablo Overlook  Fees: FREE!     Friday, August 12, 2016 Join a ranger for ranger talks on various topics.  View Details      North Cascades National Park Newhalem by Night      Time: 7:30 PM to 9:45 PM Location: Newhalem Fees: FREE!     Friday, August 12, 2016 Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 06/30/2016 to 09/02/2016 Visit Newhalem at night and enjoy the lights at Ladder Creek Falls.  View Details      North Cascades National Park Skagit Tours      Location: Newhalem, Wa Fees: Fees apply     Friday, August 12, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/30/2016 to 09/25/2016 Experience the majestic beauty of the North Cascades this summer on a Skagit Tour.
